de.esoco.lib.collection

Class CollectionEvent<E,C extends java.util.Collection<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.lib.event.GenericEvent<S>
      • de.esoco.lib.event.ElementEvent<C,E,E>
        • de.esoco.lib.collection.CollectionEvent<E,C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.event.Event<C>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListEvent

    public class CollectionEvent<E,C extends java.util.Collection<E>>
extends de.esoco.lib.event.ElementEvent<C,E,E>
    An element event subclass that contains informations related to collection modifications. Basically all element event types can occur but which types are actually used depends on the type of collection that generated the event.

      • CollectionEvent

        public CollectionEvent(de.esoco.lib.event.ElementEvent.EventType rType,
                       C rSource,
                       E rElement,
                       E rUpdateValue)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        rType - The event type
        rSource - The collection that is the source of this event
        rElement - The collection element affected by this event
        rUpdateValue - The new element value in case of update events
